Welcome to faradpy’s documentation!¶

Contents:

farad.fq.quality_trim_read(sr, window_len, min_qual)¶

Trim read with the moving window from the end.

Trim one base at a time untill all bases in the window have quality equal or above min_qual

Parameters:
  • sr – Sequencing read to be trimmed.
  • window_len (int.) – lenght of the sliding window
  • min_qual (int.) – Minimal quality used for trimming.
Returns:

Bio.SeqRecord.SeqRecord – trimmed sequencing read.
